tweet_text: Joined the MD Delegation in urging @POTUS to award the Medal of Freedom to the five men and women who were killed during the Capital Gazette shooting. They gave their lives protecting the freedom of the press & we ought to honor their sacrifice. https://t.co/pTlhTVX4lJ

name: Steny Hoyer
tweet_text: Happy birthday to @BennieGThompson. I thank him for his steadfast leadership as Chairman of @HomelandDems & his tireless work to address the growing threat of domestic extremists.

name: Steny Hoyer
tweet_text: Happy birthday to my friend and Dodgers fan @RepLindaSanchez. Thank you for helping advance comprehensive immigration reform in Congress and fighting for a stronger workforce on the @WaysMeansCmte.
